cause.description:
My daughter has leukemia and we travel for her chemo to Ottawa monthly,she has experienced more in her life than any adult has and thats not right!
1. Children should be able to live to see there graduation
2. Our kids helath is important
3. children shouldn't have to experience that type of pain
cause.mission: End all childrens suffering from cancer
cause.name: Childhood Leukemia
